actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Research, Gen. Leg.

actions.subcommittee: Conservation and Forestry following subcommittee reorganization
actions.text: Committee on Agriculture. Rereferred to the Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry following subcommittee reorganization.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Research and General Legislation

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to provide that if the Secretary of Agriculture creates a bonus rental incentive with respect to the placing of land used to produce a commodity into the conservation reserve, all previous contracts for placing land producing that commodity into the reserve must be renegotiated to provide the same increase in rental.

summary.text: Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to provide that if the Secretary of Agriculture increases rental payments offered to prospective conservation reserve participants, similar increases must be provided to participating producers of the same commodity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to provide that if the Secretary of Agriculture creates a bonus rental incentive with respect to the placing of land used to produce a commodity into the conservation reserve, all previous contracts for placing land producing that commodity into the reserve must be renegotiated to provide the same increase in rental.
